WRITING.TEXT: Thanks for all the kind words, my first time on Reddit and it's been a complete blast. Only one size available. Set up the store last week and still very much a work in progress, please allow 2-3 weeks for delivery (honestly overwhelmed by the response) each print will be sent by Royal Mail 1st class, securely flat packed. Cheers M

WRITING.TITLE: Robot Alphabet, ink on Bristol board. 29cm x 60cm

WRITING.TEXT: Wow, just woke up. What a response! Cheer guys.

Hi everyone. Thanks for all the great feedback, the piece started out as a sketch and spiralled from there, that's why some of the perspective is off. It took about 12 hours, I've been drawing in this style for a while now, not really influenced by anyone in particular. If anyone wants to see process shots and other styles I'm over on Instagram "markchilcottart" Thanks !! M
Thanks, four days on and off. Cheers!
Thanks, the original is A4 (21x29.7cm) Cheers M

rick and morty official prints released today.
My first official MARVEL prints released today!

WRITING.TEXT: Thanks, I just wanted to do what the show has done, taken a classic sci fi theme and then throw Rick and co in there. I just imagined them landing in that dimension. Here's to season 3!

The intention was to drop Rick and Morty into classic sci fi scenes, sort of like they'd appeared in that dimension. This one has sold out, but there is another... https://bottleneckgallery.com/collections/frontpage/products/mark-chilcott-hit-the-sack-jack
Glad you like them! Thank you very much, such a buzz doing prints for a show I adore. Best M
https://instagram.com/p/BOCGV8-Ahjc/ Here's a scanned version, thanks for all the comments. M
I was listening to Harmontown when I drew it, Cheers! M
Thanks!! Here's a link to my Instagram account. https://instagram.com/p/BOHoOegAe5V/ Cheers M
